eventParts.text: Hey, look! What are all those birds doing here?
Excuse me, what are you birds doing? It’s dangerous out here!
Oh, hello. Don’t worry, we can take care of ourselves. We’re going to a meeting nearby.
We’re gathering to prepare for the loneliness disaster. We want to be together when it hits.
Oh, so you’re trying to become friendly to reverse the effects of the disaster?
No, not really. I guess most of us just want to be friendly for a while before the loneliness hits. We’re not trying to fight back against the loneliness, if that’s what you’re asking.
Are all of you just okay with turning lonely? How’s that even possible? If everybirdy turns lonely society will collapse! You have to fight back!

eventConsequence.selectionText: Everybirdy can deal with the disaster the way they want to. We don’t even really know what will happen when it hits.
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
I really don’t agree. I guess I’m the only one, huh?

Alex gains +2 solitude! (ironically)

eventConsequence.selectionText: Yeah, you’re right, Alex. We can’t have everybirdy turn lonely! There must be something we can do together to stop this.
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
Yeah! Hopefully we can figure something out.

Alex gains +2 confidence!
